description.value:
Breath of Gaia
Minor Rite

Time: 1 bonus action
Cost: 1 Gnosis
Frequency: Once per long rest

Description

Breath of Gaia is a calming rite in which the Garou pauses, slows their breathing, and draws in the living essence of the world around them. Through deliberate breath and focus, the Garou realigns their spirit with Gaia, pushing aside panic, doubt, and spiritual turbulence.

This Rite does not grant strength. It restores clarity.

Effect

When you perform this Rite, choose one of the following effects:

  • You gain advantage on your next Gnosis Roll made before the end of your next turn, or
  • You gain advantage on your next Wisdom saving throw made to resist a fear, charm, or Umbral disorientation effect

Once chosen, the effect remains available until used or until the end of your next turn.

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Can only be used once per long rest
  • Does not restore Gnosis
  • Cannot be used while unconscious or incapacitated
  • You may have only one active Breath of Gaia effect at a time
